text: Ezio Vendrame (21 November 1947 – 4 April 2020) was an Italian writer, manager, and footballer, who played as a midfielder. He was born in Casarsa della Delizia, Province of Pordenone, Italy. He was known for playing for Lanerossi Vicenza, Napoli and Padova. Vandrame died on 4 April 2020 in Treviso, Italy of cancer at the age of 72.Lutto nel mondo del calcio, è morto Ezio Vendrame: il genio friulano del pallone ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Italy Category:Footballers from Friuli-Venezia Giulia
title: Ezio Vendrame
